Package Controllers

Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
Controllers.TransactionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class TransactionManager extends Object implements Manager
Transaction Manager handles the creating, reading, updating, and deleting of transactions.

  • Method Details

    • createTransaction

      public static void createTransaction(Ticket t, int movieGoerId)
      Create transaction in the transactions database responsibility of main function to generate the ticketId and movieGoerID dateTime is generated within this create method itself
      Parameters:
      t - Ticket associated with particular transaction
      movieGoerId - Movie Goer making the particular transaction

    • printTransactionList

      public static void printTransactionList()
      Read method Prints the entire transaction list in the database

    • printTransactionHistory

      public static void printTransactionHistory(int movieGoerId)
      Prints transaction history for a given user
      Parameters:
      movieGoerId - Movie Goer ID

    • readCineplexes

      protected static ArrayList readCineplexes() throws IOException
      Helper function for converting cineplexes from .txt file to array list
      Returns:
      Array list of read values from cineplex
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O error during input/output operation

    • deleteTransaction

      public static void deleteTransaction(int tid) throws Exception
      Delete transaction according to transaction ID
      Parameters:
      tid - Unique transaction ID
      Throws:
      Exception - Exception when erroneous

    • updateMovieGoerIdOfTransactions

      public static void updateMovieGoerIdOfTransactions(int oldMovieGoerId, int newMovieGoerId) throws Exception
      Update Movie Goer ID of transaction
      Parameters:
      oldMovieGoerId - Old Movie Goer ID to be replaced
      newMovieGoerId - New Movie Goer ID to replace

      Exception - Exception when erroneous
